content.question: Write a statement that uses the String method substring to extract the first initial of the first name from email and assign it to a variable. Use the results of this statement and the statements you wrote in part B to create and assign the correct value to a String variable for username 2.

frqParts.text: Write a statement that uses the String method substring to extract the first initial of the first name from email and assign it to a variable. skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
